# ti-widget-button

 `ti-widget-button` is a button with bindable properties.
  Example:
 
  ```html
	   <ti-widget-button label="OK"></ti-widget-button>
  ```	   
 
  See [demo](./ti-widget-button/demo/index.html) for a full working example of how to use this component.
